title: steve8lily
author: steve8lily
content: Hi mates, i just wonder if using lolminer 1.51a, the hashrate only can get 86mhs?

comments.author: ranochigo
comments.body: It should be closer to 100mh/s, definitely over 90mh/s. My 3070Ti manages 81mh/s out of the box.What OS are you running on and what drivers are you running. How are your temps and OC settings?

comments.author: steve8lily
comments.body: Quote from: ranochigo on May 24, 2022, 04:02:24 PMIt should be closer to 100mh/s, definitely over 90mh/s. My 3070Ti manages 81mh/s out of the box.What OS are you running on and what drivers are you running. How are your temps and OC settings?I am running win10 Pro with driver 472.12. How are your temps ----> The mem temp is 90, OC setting is default as I am new on Nvidia GPU as all my rigs are running AMD

comments.author: ranochigo
comments.body: Quote from: steve8lily on May 24, 2022, 04:40:44 PMI am running win10 Pro with driver 472.12. How are your temps ----> The mem temp is 90, OC setting is default as I am new on Nvidia GPU as all my rigs are running AMDThen you have to experiment with the OCs, try 75% Power, -200 Core Clock, +1200 Memclock.

comments.author: MidNite36
comments.body: You should be getting 98MH with 220watt on a RTX 3080 and there are some getting 100MH but not with Lolminer, you will get better hashrate with LHR cards using Nbminer and Trex, are you running on windows or Linux OS.

comments.author: steve8lily
comments.body: Quote from: ranochigo on May 24, 2022, 04:47:16 PMQuote from: steve8lily on May 24, 2022, 04:40:44 PMI am running win10 Pro with driver 472.12. How are your temps ----> The mem temp is 90, OC setting is default as I am new on Nvidia GPU as all my rigs are running AMDThen you have to experiment with the OCs, try 75% Power, -200 Core Clock, +1200 Memclock.Thanks a lot, manage to get 98.xxMhs right now!

comments.author: steve8lily
comments.body: Quote from: MidNite36 on May 24, 2022, 04:59:21 PMYou should be getting 98MH with 220watt on a RTX 3080 and there are some getting 100MH but not with Lolminer, you will get better hashrate with LHR cards using Nbminer and Trex, are you running on windows or Linux OS.I am running on win10 pro, i m manage to get 98mhs after follow the suggest OC setting, tks

comments.author: Metroid
comments.body: Quote from: ranochigo on May 24, 2022, 04:47:16 PMThen you have to experiment with the OCs, try 75% Power, -200 Core Clock, +1200 Memclock.for more than 100mhs on 3080, it needs around 1400-1500mhz minimum overclock on memory, my 3080 10gb evga ftw3 I have at 1500mhz overlock on memory and get 103mhs, memory temperature is around 76c and core temperature around 55c.

comments.author: steve8lily
comments.body: Quote from: Metroid on May 24, 2022, 10:51:17 PMQuote from: ranochigo on May 24, 2022, 04:47:16 PMThen you have to experiment with the OCs, try 75% Power, -200 Core Clock, +1200 Memclock.for more than 100mhs on 3080, it needs around 1400-1500mhz minimum overclock on memory, my 3080 10gb evga ftw3 I have at 1500mhz overlock on memory and get 103mhs, memory temperature is around 76c and core temperature around 55c.HI, tks for the guidance 1st. But i have tried to adjust to memory to 2000 before, but the hahrate seem is nothing diff, my current core temp is around 55c but the memory temp is higher than yours which is around 88c.

comments.author: Metroid
comments.body: Quote from: steve8lily on May 25, 2022, 02:04:03 AMHI, tks for the guidance 1st. But i have tried to adjust to memory to 2000 before, but the hahrate seem is nothing diff, my current core temp is around 55c but the memory temp is higher than yours which is around 88c.If you increase memory clock then you need to increase power, set the power limit to from 60 to 80. You need to adjust based on the hashrate you are getting, memory overlock at 2000 is too much, I would not risk it, I leave mine at 1500mhz because my memory temp is below 80c.

comments.author: steve8lily
comments.body: Quote from: Metroid on May 25, 2022, 02:36:50 AMQuote from: steve8lily on May 25, 2022, 02:04:03 AMHI, tks for the guidance 1st. But i have tried to adjust to memory to 2000 before, but the hahrate seem is nothing diff, my current core temp is around 55c but the memory temp is higher than yours which is around 88c.If you increase memory clock then you need to increase power, set the power limit to from 60 to 80. You need to adjust based on the hashrate you are getting, memory overlock at 2000 is too much, I would not risk it, I leave mine at 1500mhz because my memory temp is below 80c.Tks bro, managed to get 101mhs after increase power limit to 80! Tks for guidance!
